title: Nutritional needs of our bodies
brief_description: Using photomicrography, laboratory animals, and animation, shows how food provides the body’s basic needs. Describes the four general groups of foods, the nutrients which they contain, and what the nutrients supply to the body. The importance of a well-balanced diet to a strong body and good health is stressed.
